item.title: Cybersecurity Is Now a Core Business Discipline
item.dc:creator: Steve Durbin
item.description:
Boardroom conversations about cyber can no longer be siloed apart from strategy, operations, or geopolitics.

The post Cybersecurity Is Now a Core Business Discipline appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Ransomware Attack Disrupts Local Emergency Alert System Across US
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
The OnSolve CodeRED platform has been targeted by the Inc Ransom ransomware group, resulting in disruptions and a data breach.

The post Ransomware Attack Disrupts Local Emergency Alert System Across US appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Opti Raises $20 Million for Identity Security Platform
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
The cybersecurity startup plans to use the seed funding to accelerate product expansion and global growth.

The post Opti Raises $20 Million for Identity Security Platform appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Dartmouth College Confirms Data Theft in Oracle Hack
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Dartmouth College has disclosed a data breach after cybercriminals leaked over 226 Gb of files stolen from the university.

The post Dartmouth College Confirms Data Theft in Oracle Hack appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Russian Hackers Target US Engineering Firm Because of Work Done for Ukrainian Sister City
item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.description:
The attack on the engineering firm was identified by Arctic Wolf in September before it could disrupt the engineering company’s operations or spread further.

The post Russian Hackers Target US Engineering Firm Because of Work Done for Ukrainian Sister City appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: CISA Warns of Spyware Targeting Messaging App Users
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
CISA has described the techniques used by attackers and pointed out that the focus is on high-value individuals.

The post CISA Warns of Spyware Targeting Messaging App Users appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: AI Agent Security Firm Vijil Raises $17 Million
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Focusing on improving the resilience of AI agents, the startup will use the funding to accelerate deployments of its platform.

The post AI Agent Security Firm Vijil Raises $17 Million appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Alumni, Student, and Staff Information Stolen From Harvard University
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
A phone phishing attack led to the compromise of a system containing information about alumni, donors, students, staff, and other individuals.

The post Alumni, Student, and Staff Information Stolen From Harvard University appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Fluent Bit Vulnerabilities Expose Cloud Services to Takeover
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Five flaws in the open source tool may lead to path traversal attacks, remote code execution, denial-of-service, and tag manipulation.

The post Fluent Bit Vulnerabilities Expose Cloud Services to Takeover appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: WormGPT 4 and KawaiiGPT: New Dark LLMs Boost Cybercrime Automation
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Palo Alto Networks has conducted an analysis of malicious LLMs that help threat actors with phishing, malware development, and reconnaissance. 

The post WormGPT 4 and KawaiiGPT: New Dark LLMs Boost Cybercrime Automation appeared first on SecurityWeek.
